body_html: Actually, I'll leave this open in case and renamed in case someone wants to finally make decode_image which handles both. It's almost possible to do it in Python, or it could be done in C++ with a bunch of code sharing with decode_png and decode_jpeg.
body_text: Actually, I'll leave this open in case and renamed in case someone wants to finally make decode_image which handles both.  It's almost possible to do it in Python, or it could be done in C++ with a bunch of code sharing with decode_png and decode_jpeg.
body: Actually, I'll leave this open in case and renamed in case someone wants to finally make `decode_image` which handles both.  It's almost possible to do it in Python, or it could be done in C++ with a bunch of code sharing with `decode_png` and `decode_jpeg`.
